ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Quickly and easily copying text from any visible content on a Windows screen, even if the text is part of an image or application element.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Windows 10/11 â€¢ Extracts text from screenshots of any visible content
ðŸ“– Summary: Text Grab is a C# Windows utility that uses Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to extract text from any visible content on the screen. It leverages the Windows API for local OCR processing, allowing users to copy text from images, videos, or application elements that don't support text selection. The application offers multiple modes for flexible text grabbing.
